lexUnit.name: shooting.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of killing somebody with a gun.

sentence.text: The bombings were thought to be in retaliation for the shooting by British soldiers in an undercover operation on Oct. 9 of IRA activists Desmond Grew and Martin McCaughey near Loughgall in south Armagh .
